subject: Re: [junit] Help plzzzzzz.......
msgSnippet: ... Get a copy of Dave Astels, Test-Driven Development: A Practical Guide . It s the best description of testing a Swing UI with JUnit I have ever seen. -- J.
messageBody:
Vimal Kumar wrote:

> Just help us on how to implement UI testing for a program with some
> sample source codes and their corresponding test codes. Help needed
> desperately !!!!!

Get a copy of Dave Astels, "Test-Driven Development: A Practical Guide".
It's the best description of testing a Swing UI with JUnit I have ever seen.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
